page.title: 14POPULATION IN DEERNESS
page.content: Deerness is a{well-populated}rural area with only 3% of the houses empty apart from those being renovated. The population enjoys a high standard of health, resulting in the majority living to enjoy their{retirement}with several over 80 years leading active lives. 1 birth and 2 deaths is the annual average. 4% of the people are under school age, l6% at school, 54% working age, l8% over 65, and 8% over 80 years. In the{over 65 group}most have spent their entire working lives in Deerness. In the{working age group l2% have moved with their families from mainland Britain. The native inhabitants and those who have moved into the community{integrate well}and benefit from each other's experiences Distinctions of{social classes}is unknown in Deerness as it is unknown in the whole of the Orkney Islands.
